Description_lang: Chains two enemy targets together. While the targets are over $s1 yds apart the chains inflict $M3 Fire damage every $t1 sec. This damage increases by $s2% each second they remain apart. The chains will break if the targets remain apart for $u total seconds.
AuraDescription_lang: Fire damage inflicted if over $s1 yds from linked player.Damage increases $s2% per stack.Breaks at $u stacks.
